short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to display world time zones based on selected cities.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
World Time Zone
Keep track of global time zones with ease!
World Time Zone is your personal global clock, right in your browser. Whether you're managing international teams, scheduling global meetings, or just curious about the time around the world, our extension has you covered.
Key Features:

Multiple Cities: Add and track time for cities across different countries and time zones.
Customizable Interface: Arrange your cities in any order you prefer with an easy drag-and-drop interface.
Color Coding: Assign colors to each city for quick visual reference.
Real-Time Updates: Times update automatically, ensuring you always have the current time.
Offline Functionality: Works without an internet connection, perfect for travelers.

Perfect for:

International business professionals
Global project managers
Remote teams across different time zones
Frequent travelers
Anyone with friends or family abroad

Never miss a deadline or schedule a 3 AM call by mistake again. Install World Time Zone now and bring the world's clocks to your fingertips!

UPDATES :
Enhanced time zone management with daylight saving adjustments and UX improvements for a smoother experience.
